taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume you have already defined the required process variables for the business process.
taskbody.context: Result mapping enables output of one activity to become input for an ensuing activity. This task is about storing results in a human task for future use.

step.cmd: Click on the Human task to edit its properties in the Property view pane.
Click on the command button in the property called Result Mapping.
Click on the Add button to add Parameter(s) for storing results.
Choose the field whose current value must be passed on to subsequent activities from the drop down, listing all the attributes of the version associated with the Human task.
Assign the value of these fields to the appropriate process variables. All the defined process variables appear in the dropdown list in the Variable Column.

step.stepresult: The result mappings are displayed against the property Result Mapping.
